TopicTitle: Age of Sail - Old timey naval battle

Articles.Content:
I recently conducted a small battle between two sailing ships that I spent several hours designing. Both are fully functional, with an interior for the crew and working cannons. Each ship was around 400 parts, so controlling the ships and recording the action was an arduous task. I hope you enjoy. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
